popularityCurve.label: instead of proposing legislation which will just add more to the 68 million unused acres i think we should try something that might be a little better than that

clusterList.phrase: instead of proposing legislation which will just add more to the 68 million unused acres i think we should try something that might be a little better than that
we could protect the crops somehow we could reimburse the farmers that have crop damage and call it a day
american farmers are planting 324 million acres this year up 4 million acres from 2007 too much of the best land is waterlogged however indiana and illinois have been the worst hit
that means getting the most out of every acre of farm land with innovative crop protection products
